backend/main.mo: Defines the actor and all ERP data types including organizations, CRM, HRMS, products, orders, and storage mixins.
backend/migration.mo: Contains a migration module that passes through existing organization data unchanged.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of many frontend files for reference or documentation.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base styles with OKLCH theme variables for light and dark modes.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point mounting the React app via main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up routing, providers, authentication handling, and global modals for the React app.
frontend/src/components/admin/CategoryMa: Admin UI to create, edit, and delete categories using a dialog form and mutation hooks.
frontend/src/components/admin/OrderManag: Admin table showing all orders with editable statuses and formatted order details.
frontend/src/components/admin/Organizati: UI for listing organizations, creating new ones via dialog, and showing members using query hooks.
frontend/src/components/admin/ProductMan: Product CRUD interface with dialog-based add/edit, category selection, and delete actions using query hooks.
frontend/src/components/crm/ContactManag: Manages contacts with add/edit/delete dialogs, identity-based ownership, and table display.
frontend/src/components/crm/LeadManageme: Handles lead CRUD with stages, contact association, revenue fields, and identity-based ownership.
frontend/src/components/crm/OpportunityM: Provides opportunity CRUD with value, probability, stage selection, notes, and identity-linked ownership.
frontend/src/components/crm/PipelineOver: Displays sales pipeline metrics by stage using query data and renders progress bars and summary stats.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Footer component with copyright, caffeine.ai link, and GitHub icon.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Header with navigation, authentication controls, org switcher, admin links, and cart indicator.
frontend/src/components/hrms/AttendanceM: Static placeholder card indicating attendance tracking will be added later.
frontend/src/components/hrms/DepartmentM: Provides CRUD UI for departments with dialogs, forms, and table listings using query mutations.
frontend/src/components/hrms/EmployeeMan: Handles employee creation, editing, and deletion with form dialogs and status badges tied to HR dashboard data.
frontend/src/components/hrms/LeaveManage: Shows pending leave requests and allows approving or rejecting them with mutation calls.
frontend/src/components/hrms/PayrollMana: Placeholder card indicating payroll processing functionality is upcoming.
frontend/src/components/hrms/Performance: Placeholder component for future employee performance tracking features.
frontend/src/components/OrganizationSwit: Dropdown component allowing authenticated users to switch between organizations.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: Modal prompting users to enter their name and submit a profile creation request via a mutation.
frontend/src/components/StripeSetupModal: Admin-only modal for configuring Stripe by submitting a secret key and allowed countries.
frontend/src/components/WalletManagement: Interface for listing, adding, and deleting wallets with dialogs, validations, and backend mutations.
frontend/src/components/WalletSummary.ts: Displays user wallet balances and recent transactions with auto-refresh and status badges.
frontend/src/contexts/CartContext.tsx: Implements a shopping cart context with persistent storage, quantity updates, totals, and item management.
frontend/src/contexts/OrganizationContex: Manages active organization selection, persistence, and loading user organizations via query hooks.
frontend/src/contexts/WalletConnectorCon: Provides React context for managing wallet connector selection, availability checks, and connect/disconnect workflow.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches a backend actor tied to the user's identity and refreshes dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements an Internet Identity provider and hook for managing authentication, identity loading, and login state.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Wraps backend actor calls using React Query for user profiles, organizations, and other ERP-related data operations.
frontend/src/hooks/useWalletConnector.ts: Re-exports the wallet connector hook from the context module.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers and CSS variables for light/dark theming and global styles.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with Internet Identity and React Query providers.
frontend/src/pages/AdminDashboard.tsx: Renders the admin dashboard with analytics, management tabs, and access control checks.
frontend/src/pages/CartPage.tsx: Implements the shopping cart page with item management, Stripe or ICP checkout flows, and wallet connection handling.
frontend/src/pages/CrmDashboard.tsx: Renders the admin-only CRM dashboard with stats, tabs, and management components for contacts, leads, and opportunities.
frontend/src/pages/HrmsDashboard.tsx: Provides an admin-only HRMS dashboard with tabs for employees, departments, attendance, payroll, and performance data.
frontend/src/pages/OrdersPage.tsx: Displays the user's order history with status badges and cancellation support.
frontend/src/pages/PaymentFailurePage.ts: Shows a failure message after unsuccessful payment with navigation options back to cart or home.
frontend/src/pages/PaymentSuccessPage.ts: Clears the cart and displays a success confirmation with links to orders or continued shopping.
frontend/src/pages/StorefrontPage.tsx: Lists products with search and category filtering, showing stock status and allowing items to be added to the cart.
frontend/src/types/erp-types.ts: Defines placeholder ERP domain types for products, orders, CRM, HR, and payroll until backend interfaces are finalized.
frontend/src/utils/formatIdentity.ts: Utility to truncate and format identity strings for display.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Helpers to read URL parameters, persist them in sessionStorage, and manage hash-based routing params.
frontend/src/wallets/connectors/oisyConn: Implements a wallet connector for Oisy, handling availability checks, connect/disconnect, and connection state.
frontend/src/wallets/connectors/plugConn: Implements a wallet connector for Plug, including connection flow, identity retrieval, and disconnect handling.
frontend/src/wallets/inpageProviders.d.t: Ambient TypeScript definitions for Plug and Oisy inpage wallet providers on window.ic.
frontend/src/wallets/walletConnectorRegi: Registers available wallet connectors and provides lookup helpers by provider ID.
frontend/src/wallets/walletConnectorType: Defines wallet connector interfaces, provider IDs, and connected identity types.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom colors, animations, and plugins like typography and container queries.
project_state.json: Describes the projectâ€™s current state, features, and roadmap for multi-tenant ERP and wallet integration.
